meanings.sent1: Her unbraided hair flowed freely down her back.
meanings.sent2: The unbraided rope was fraying at the ends.
meanings.sent3: The unbraided shoelaces kept coming undone during the race.
meanings.sent4: The unbraided threads of the fabric created a unique texture.
meanings.sent5: The unbraided strands of yarn were soft to the touch.

meanings.sent1: She unbraided her hair before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He unbraided the rope to use it for a different purpose.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child unbraided his sister's hair while she napped.
meanings.sent4: The detective unbraided the mystery to reveal the truth.
meanings.sent5: The magician unbraided the scarf to the amazement of the audience.
